title: Test database and API deployment for EITI data
description: A test interface using fake data to prototype the deployment of a company database based on EITI data

companies_with_projects.sql: SELECT companies.label AS company, json_group_array(projects.label) AS projects FROM companies JOIN project_companies ON companies.id = project_companies.company_id JOIN projects ON projects.id = project_companies.project_id GROUP BY companies.label
companies_with_projects.title: List of Companies with Associated Projects
companies_with_projects.description: This query retrieves the list of companies and the projects they are associated with in a structured JSON format.

projects_with_companies.sql: SELECT projects.label AS project, json_group_array(companies.label) AS companies FROM projects JOIN project_companies ON projects.id = project_companies.project_id JOIN companies ON companies.id = project_companies.company_id GROUP BY projects.label
projects_with_companies.title: List of Projects with Associated Companies
projects_with_companies.description: This query retrieves the list of projects and the companies they are associated with in a structured JSON format.
